channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What's Next: How Top MLB Signings and Trades Affect New Teams, Free Agency
item.description: When a key player moves on, there's always a big questions about what's next for the teams involved. We're breaking down all of MLB's big deals.

item.title: Cowboys Close to Hiring Eagles Christian Parker as Defensive Coordinator
item.description: The Dallas Cowboys are close to an agreement to hire Philadelphia Eagles passing game coordinator Christian Parker as their new defensive coordinator.

item.title: Big Picture: Another Dynasty in New England? Patriots Built for Sustained Success
item.description: The Patriots could soon be back in the Super Bowl, and with Drake Maye and Mike Vrabel at the helm, that may become a habit again.

item.title: NFL AFC, NFC Title Report: Books, Public Agree Rams-Seahawks 'is the Super Bowl'
item.description: Regardless of who wins this weekend, the NFC's Super Bowl representative will be the favorite. Patrick Everson reports.

item.title: UFL 2026: Full Regular-Season Schedule Released for All 8 Teams
item.description: The 2026 UFL season is set to kick off on Friday, March 27. Here are the full 2026 schedules for all eight teams!

item.title: McCaffrey, 4 QBs named AP NFL MVP finalists
item.description: Christian McCaffrey has become only the second player to be a finalist for three AP NFL awards in the same year, joining Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, ...

item.title: Kansas' Self plans to return vs. Kansas State
item.description: Kansas coach Bill Self intends to be on the sideline Saturday night when the No. 19 Jayhawks travel to play Kansas State.

item.title: Moore returns to court, wants charges dismissed
item.description: Ex-Michigan coach Sherrone Moore returned to court, with his lawyer saying he's seeking to have home invasion and other charges against him dismissed.

item.title: Fins GM: Work to do before we ID 'our guy' at QB
item.description: Dolphins general manager Jon-Eric Sullivan has a plan for the team's quarterbacks moving forward, but there's "too much work to do" before it makes a ...

item.title: Sources: Nats' Gore to Rangers in 5-for-1 trade
item.description: The Rangers are acquiring All-Star left-hander MacKenzie Gore from the Nationals in exchange for five prospects, sources told ESPN.
